mobify-cloud.title: Mobify Cloud
mobify-cloud.teaser: This Mobify website versioning, testing, and deployment platform serves partners, customers, and developers.

beyond-the-rack.title: Beyond The Rack
beyond-the-rack.teaser: Beyond The Rack is an online-only retailer, I worked on their web-enabled Android native application.

sundown.title: Sundown
sundown.teaser: This iOS application tracks the sunset and provides the user a countdown, and some fitting music to go along with the magic hour.

ritchie-brothers.title: Ritchie Brothers
ritchie-brothers.teaser: This large-scale auctioneering service needed native apps to compliment it's online bidding experience.

curriculate.title: Curriculate
curriculate.teaser: This web application project is meant to be a way for educators to easily plan and present in the classroom with the same tool.
